SELECT * FROM( (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE_PK1) */ SEQ, GRP_CD, TELCO, RCG_TYPE, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_COMMON_CD_NM('CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE','RCG_TYPE', RCG_TYPE) RCG_TYPE_NM, PROD_CD, NVL(${db.mainschema}.F_GET_SERVICE_CD_NM(PROD_CD), '기본') PROD_CD_NM, RATE_GUBUN, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_COMMON_CD_NM('CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE','RATE_GUBUN', RATE_GUBUN) RATE_GUBUN_NM, TO_CHAR(ENTER_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ENTER_DT, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_ADMIN_INFO('ADMIN_NAME', ADMIN_ID) ADMIN_NM, RATE, (CASE WHEN MIN_AMOUNT = 99999999 THEN 'MAX' ELSE CAST(MIN_AMOUNT AS VARCHAR) END) MIN_AMOUNT FROM ${db.mainschema}.CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE A WHERE SEQ > -20000000 AND GRP_CD = #{grpCd} AND SEQ < 0 ORDER BY SEQ DESC)
UNION ALL
(SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE_PK1) */ SEQ, GRP_CD, TELCO, RCG_TYPE, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_COMMON_CD_NM('CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE','RCG_TYPE', RCG_TYPE) RCG_TYPE_NM, PROD_CD, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_SERVICE_CD_NM(PROD_CD) PROD_CD_NM, RATE_GUBUN, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_COMMON_CD_NM('CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE','RATE_GUBUN', RATE_GUBUN) RATE_GUBUN_NM, TO_CHAR(ENTER_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ENTER_DT, ${db.mainschema}.F_GET_ADMIN_INFO('ADMIN_NAME', ADMIN_ID) ADMIN_NM, RATE, (CASE WHEN MIN_AMOUNT = 99999999 THEN 'MAX' ELSE CAST(MIN_AMOUNT AS VARCHAR) END) MIN_AMOUNT FROM ${db.mainschema}.CD_AGENT_RCG_RATE A WHERE SEQ > -20000000 AND GRP_CD = #{grpCd} AND SEQ > 0 ORDER BY TELCO, RCG_TYPE, PROD_CD, MIN_AMOUNT)
)
